text: Petrus Thomas Ratajczyk (January 4, 1962 â€“ April 14, 2010), known professionally as Peter Steele, was an American musician and singer- songwriter. He was best known as the lead vocalist, bassist and composer of the gothic metal band Type O Negative. Steele also created the metal group Fallout and the thrash band Carnivore. Steele died at a hospital in Scranton, Pennsylvania on April 14, 2010 from sepsis caused by diverticulitis, aged 48. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from diverticulitis Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:American heavy metal singers Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American bass guitarists Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Singer-songwriters from New York City
